title: Merry Christmas!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>AAAAAH~! A-, ah.... Setsuna-san, come here, look!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What is it, Hanayo-san? ....Wait, t-, this is....!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>The Christmas limited school idol goods that were sold out at all of the other stores~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I can’t believe we found these here.... It must be a Christmas miracle!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I think I’ll buy one for myself and another one for the gift exchange at today’s Christmas party....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>That’s a good idea! Then, I’ll buy this one for my gift....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ah, these ones are so cute too! I want these~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufu. It must also be a Christmas miracle that we found these. Let’s buy them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Oh, it’s getting late. Let’s hurry, Setsuna-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Okay! The Christmas party will be lots of fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
